segments.text: Would you tell me how I send this parcel to shanghai , China ? It contains only books .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You might send it as printed matter .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wonder if you could have ensured here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . How much would you want to ensure this books for ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me see . I think I can have the ensured five hundred dollars .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: five hundred dollars , so you ’ ll pay ten dollars for the insurance . That ’ s two percent of the total value of the article .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here ‘ s the check for hen dollars
segments.speaker: S1
